name: Origami'jin
description:
This was supposed to be our entry into LD45. We wanted to be done by Sunday night, but that stretched into Monday, and we missed the Jam submission deadline. Finally, I finished the build on Tuesday evening. Regardless, we had a great jam, learned a lot, and grew as a team! Hopefully, we'll be participating in many projects in the future.

Now, on to the game.

The theme was "Start with Nothing." Well, nothingness is connected to outer space, and we thought it would be interesting to put together a creation-of-the-world game.

The art and music came together pretty flawlessly, but I was the only programmer, so that was the bottleneck.

I don't want to give too much away, so just play it and let us know what you think.
